changelog:
New:
- Auto face unlock v2 (Pie)

Fixed:
- fixed Wireless Display (miracast)
- fixed Signature Spoofing (MicroG)
- fixed an issue where unlocking the SIM PIN failed

Improvements:
- kernel and ROM are build with SDClang 6.0.9 (more performance and smoothness)
- improved haptic feedback
- improved resolution of bootanimation
- switched to 'user' builds from 'userdebug' ones
- OP gestures tweaks
- Improvements for render engine

Kernel:
- improted 8.12.27 touch firmware
